name: Mission Demolition (tome2)
description:
Title: Mission Demolition

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E Target 

Market: All ages

Game Overview: The objective is to use the slingshot and hit the green goal in the least amount of shots 

Instructions: Place mouse on the slingshot, hold and drag back and release the mouse to shoot the ball. The objective is to hit the green goal.

Game Design Team: Sourced from "Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping, and Development" by Jeremy Gibson Bond
